TopicTitle: First trip to the North Pole. Check out my hyper jet :D

Articles.Content:
So I would say this is my first real good long distance airplane.. 100% built by me.. probably not an original design.. but still.

top speed was 20,000meters going 1500m/s! (I was impressed)

Goes from kerbal base to north pole in around 10 minutes.
It looks like too much wing surface for such fast aircraft.

It looks like too much wing surface for such fast aircraft.

In the screens it only shows 900m/s, and top speed was around 1100m/s.

But then I added 2 more intakes on each side and top speed was 1500m/s

no cheats or anything.
